After years of professional development, we now probably  have more tradition, experience and market presence than almost any other law firm in Croatia. That puts us in a unique situation where we could help our clients not just in law related issues but also in almost any business related issue.
data.text:
Čipčić-Bragadin Mesić and Associates is one of the leading legal advisers in Croatia that serve companies, financial institutions and private clients. After years of professional development, we now probably have more tradition, experience and market presence than almost any other law firm in Croatia. That puts us in a unique situation where we could help our clients not just in law related issues but also in almost any business related issue. In fact, we like to pride ourselves to be more than a law firm but rather a full service legal advisers. At Čipčić - Bragadin Mesić and Associates today, the flavour is definitely international. Around 80% of our major clients are international enterprises doing business in Croatia. We work closely with the leading international law firms and consultants so we're able to manage complex, cross-border projects and deals seamlessly and successfully. We foster international knowledge and experience and push our lawyers to achieve those. It's the only way we could stay ahead of our competition and we are doing it successfully. We care about our clients' businesses and want them to succeed and to be able to do that, we must get to know our clients very well. We are aiming to be organised around key sectors so that we could share our in-depth industry knowledge more effectively across the firm. Today, we have experience in a broad range of sectors which makes us uniquely positioned to understand the whole scope of clients' businesses. Not just the law. We enjoy doing what we do and try to do it in the best possible manner. We observe the highest personal, ethical and professional standards in everything we do and operate with integrity at all times. We recognize that the reputation of our firm is vital to our success and we all have a duty to preserve and grow it for the long term. Proudly serving clients since 1928.

Website

http://www.cipcic-bragadin.com
